Classmate: What is up with your notes?  My notes: If you want to change back and forth between Fahrenheit and Kelvin you must go through Celsius first. Kelvin and Fahrenheit are like two ex-spouses with serious baggage who are arguing over assets in the divorce. Nobody talks directly, because Felicity is going to key Kevin's car if she has to interact with that cheating bastard and hear about his new side-piece, Melinda. Nobody wants that. Everything goes through a mediator named Celsius, and Celsius needs a drink after all the back and forth.

An easy way to convert °C to °F hope it helps 😊😊:- C = 5/9 (F-32) Ex. 59°F to °C C= 5/9 (59-32) C= 5/9 (27) do cutting of 9 and 27 that is 3 and multiply 5 *3  Ans = 15 °C
